short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Selects next video after a timeout - great for interval workouts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use this extension when doing circuit training, so your favorite music will help you transition to the next video on time. 
    
When enabled, this extension will play a portion of a video and then transition to the next video after the configured transition period.

works on youtube, reels, music.youtube, and soundcloud

open source project at 
https://github.com/chadsteele/VideoTimerChromeExtension
